dialogue.content: My allergies have been bothering me again.
Is it mostly sneezing, itchy eyes, congestion, or all of the above?
Got it. Are you using any meds for it right now?
I have a nasal spray but I forget to use it consistently.
Okay. Do symptoms feel worse at specific times of day?
Mornings are the worst, then it eases up.
Understood. We can make a simple routine that fits your mornings.
If I could stop forgetting the spray in the morning, I think I'd feel way better.
